title: David Tukhmanov - On The Wave Of My Memories - 1976
description:
David Tukhmanov - On The Wave Of My Memories - 1976

1 - I Mentually Enter into Your Cabinet (based on the poem by Maximilian Voloshin)
2 - From Sappho (translated to Russian by Vikenty Veresaev)
3 - From Vagantes (translated to Russian by Lev Ginsburg)
4 - The Invitation to Travel (based on the poem by Charles Baudelaire, translated to Russian by Irina Ozerova)
5 - Good Night (based on the poem by Percy Bysshe Shelley, in English)
6 - On a Wave of My Memory (based on the poem by Nicola's Guille'n, translated to Russian by Inna Tynyanova)
7 - Sentimental Walk (based on the poem by Paul Verlaine, translated to Russian by Ariadna Efron, in Russian and French)
8 - Heart, My Heart (based on the poem by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, translated to Russian by Vilgelm Levik, in Russian and German)
9 - Confusion (based on the poem by Anna Akhmatova)
10 - Dedication in an Album (based on the poem by Adam Mickiewicz, translated into Russian by Semyon Kirsanov, in Polish and Russian)

David Tukhmanov, keyboards, piano, classical organ
Boris Pivovarov, guitar
Arcady Feldbarg, bass, flute
Vladimir Plotkin, drums
Brass group of band Melodia conducted by Georgi Garanyan
Stringed group of Big Symphonic Orchestra (the conductor is Konstantin Krimets)

==================
